entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of snow late this evening and overnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023
